info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:34PM CDT until May 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT/415 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEA AND NORTHEASTERN LOVING COUNTIES... At 434 PM CDT/334 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 21 miles southwest of Eunice Airport, or 21 miles northwest of Jal, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Lea and northeastern Loving Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
